text.div:
HL7BEReferralPrescriptionWGImplementationGuideworkinprogress

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/referral/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.be.referral

name: HL7BEReferralPrescriptionWGImplementationGuideworkinprogress
title: HL7 BE Referral Prescription WG Implementation Guide (work in progress)

resource.name: BeLabPrescription
resource.description: This is the Belgian profile for a laboratory order.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescription
resource.description: The common structure for referral prescription.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionDiagnosticImaging
resource.description:
Referral prescription for a generic diagnostic imaging.
Please note in .orderDetail, a specific slicing is available to give guidance how to express acquisition modalities if needed. In future iterations of this profile, more slicing might provide additional guidance.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursing
resource.description: The nursing profile, generic version. Please note the nursing referral for medication does NOT depend on this generic version but is a FHIR prodfile on a different FHIR resource (MedicationRequest)

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingAnnex81PreparationOfMedication
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for preparation of medication. Use the .note element to provide any extra information.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingBladderCare
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for bladder care. Actual bladder care information lives in the .orderDetail element. If needed to give a quantity (mandatory if bladder instillation): the .quantity element shall be used. If needed to express the product and time to leave the product (mandatory if bladder instillation): please explain in the .note element.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingCompressionTherapy
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for compression therapy.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingDiabetic
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for diabetic services. Use the .note element to provide any extra information.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingDigestiveSystemCare
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for digestive system care. If needed to give any details (e.g. details around the enteral feeding): please use the .note element.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingGenMedication
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for medication. Note this profile is based on the FHIR resource MedicationRequest. Dosage is expected initially to be given in the corresponding text and optional site fields (as per the NIHDI requirements).

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingMedication
resource.description:
The nursing profile specialized for medication. Note this profile is based on the FHIR resource MedicationRequest.
Dosage is expected initially to be given in the corresponding text and optional site fields (as per the NIHDI requirements)

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingNonReimbursable
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for non reimbursable care. Use the .note element to provide any extra information.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingOther
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for other care. Use the .note element to provide any extra information.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingPreparationAdministrationMedicationChronicalPsychiatricPatient
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for preparation and administration of medication to chronical pshychiatric patient. Use the .note element to provide any extra information. The prescriber SHALL give a start and end date & SHALL give a frequency, these informations live in the .occurrence element.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingWoundcare
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for wound care. Use the .note element to provide any extra information.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionRequestGroup
resource.description: Envelope that allows different referralprescriptions to have an order

resource.name: BeCoPrescriber
resource.description: Other practitioners that must take part in this prescripiton

resource.name: BeContraindication
resource.description: Contra indication in a prescription referral for diagnostic imaging.

resource.name: BeContrastFluidUse
resource.description: Whether the use of contrast fluid in diagnostic imaging can be defined as 'If necessary' or 'Not permitted.'

resource.name: BeExecutionPeriod
resource.description: Begin and enddate of the execution of the request

resource.name: BeInformParty
resource.description: Extra parties that need to be informed of the outcome, besides the prescriber.

resource.name: BeIntendedPerformer
resource.description: Intended performers for this request

resource.name: BeLastestEndDate
resource.description: Request must be performed before

resource.name: BeProposalType
resource.description: Type of proposal

resource.name: BeSupportingInfo
resource.description: Relevant clinical information in the context of this prescription concerning for example allergies, kidney function, diabetic. This extension allows the use of an Annotation or codeableConcept but when more detailed information can be given, it is RECOMMENDED to express it as structured as possible using the appropriate elements.

resource.name: BeTaskReference
resource.description: BeTaskReference

resource.name: BeUrgentCommunication
resource.description: When there is a need to urgently communicate results of an order.

resource.name: BeValidityPeriod
resource.description: Begin and enddate of the validity of the request

resource.name: BeDiagnosticImagingPrescription
resource.description: Logical model describing the model for the diagnostic imaging prescription. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.

resource.name: BeLaboratoryPrescription
resource.description: Logical model describing the model for the prescription laboratory. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for laboratory.

resource.name: BeModelReferralPrescription
resource.description: Logical model describing the model for the prescription referral. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.

resource.name: BeBladderCareType
resource.description: Codes to define a type of bladder care.

resource.name: BeCoPrescriptionStatus
resource.description: This is the status of the prescription for the coprescriber

resource.name: BeCommunicationMethod
resource.description: Codes to define a communication method.

resource.name: BeCompressionType
resource.description: Codes to define a type of compression therapy.

resource.name: BeContrastFluidUse
resource.description: Codes to define the use of contrast fluid.

resource.name: BeDigestiveSystemCare
resource.description: Codes to define digestive system care

resource.name: BeNonReimbursableNursing
resource.description: Codes to define a type of non reimbursable nursing category.

resource.name: BeNursingAnnex81InadequateAdherence
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing annex81 inadequate adherence.

resource.name: BeNursingAnnex81InadequateAdherenceLink
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing annex81 inadequate adherence link.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationCategory
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing medication category.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationInjection
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing medication injection.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationOther
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing medication other.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationPercutaneous
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing medication percutaneous.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationPerfusion
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing medication perfusion.

resource.name: BeNursingType
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing.

resource.name: BeOtherNursing
resource.description: Codes to define a type of other nursing category.

resource.name: BePrescriptionStatus
resource.description: This is the status of the prescription

resource.name: BeReasonReferralStatus
resource.description: Codes to explain the current status of a referral prescription.

resource.name: BeBladderCareType
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the bladder care category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeCommunicationCode
resource.description: Communication codes in Belgium. To define a specific method of communicating. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeContrastFluidUse
resource.description: Whether use of contrast fluid should be considered.

resource.name: BeDigestiveSystemCare
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the digestive system care category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingAnnex81InadequateAdherence
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the annex 81 diagnostics of inadequate adherence. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingAnnex81InadequateAdherenceLink
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the annex 81 diagnostics of inadequate adherence. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingCode
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define a high level in nursing activities. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingCodeCompressiontherapy
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for compression therapy. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingCodeNonReimbursable
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the non reimbursable category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingCodeOther
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the other category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationCategory
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the medication category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationInjection
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the medication injection category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationPercutaneous
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the medication percutaneous category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingMedicationPerfusion
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for the medication perfusion category. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BePrescriptionProposalType
resource.description: Prescription Proposal Type. Indicates the type of proposal (new or prolongation) as from the uses cases by NIHDI

resource.name: BePrescriptionStatus
resource.description: Prescription status in Belgium. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeStatusReason
resource.description: Status reason in Belgium. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNSCoronalertcode
resource.description: Code as generated by the Coronalert app.

resource.name: BeNSSpecimen
resource.description: National identifier for a specimen when needed.

resource.name: BeUnadressedHealthMessageExchangePlatform
resource.description: UHMEP naming system

resource.name: be-op-cancel
resource.description: Cancel Referral Prescription or Proposal

resource.name: BeReferralCategory
resource.description: Codes to define the high level category for a referral prescription. SNOMED-CT codes in this valueset are just a draft proposal to give a general idea - pending an official valueset.
